Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

1 Frozen Tator Tots
1 Lawlry Salk Free Seasoning and wash

Vegan Recipe

Open 1 Frozen Tator Tots
Put one layer of tator tots in airfryer and sprinkle 1 Lawlry Salk Free Seasoning
Wait 19 minutes Cook @ 400 deg
